extendedInfo.description: My LAP-BANDÂ® mobile app is designed to support your weight-loss journey on the go! This motivational, easy-to-use app provides an array of tools that will give you quick and easy access to:     â¢ See what you might look like 30-100 plus pounds thinner     â¢ Find healthy recipes on the go     â¢ Enter your weight daily and track your progress      â¢ Record doctor appointments and set reminders     â¢ Get inspired with success stories from those whoâve made the journey     â¢ Register instantly for a LAP-BANDÂ® seminar Important LAP-BANDÂ® System Safety InformationThe LAP-BANDÂ® System is indicated for weight reduction for patients with obesity, with a Body Mass Index (BMI) of at least 40 kg/mÂ² or a BMI of at least 30 kg/mÂ² with one or more obesity related comorbid conditions.  LAP-BANDÂ® is not for those who are pregnant, or have symptoms of autoimmune, severe heart, lung, or gastrointestinal disease, cirrhosis or pancreatitis. Surgery-related fatalities, reoperation, and band removal are rare. Band slippage, stomach injury, vomiting and heartburn may occur. For full safety information please visit www.lapband.com or call Allergan Product Support at 1-800-624-4261.  Rx Only.APC62EC11

reviews.title: Don\'t work
reviews.comment: Whether I have 3g, 4g, or WiFi it still says no internet connection.
reviews.author: Wendy Turner

reviews.title: Don\'t bother to download!
reviews.comment: Every time I try to log in it says, \"error, no internet access\". Waste of time
reviews.author: Nancy Brown

reviews.title: DON\'T INSTALL! WASTE OF TIME DOSEN\'T WORK AND NO SUPPORT SPAMMY APP
reviews.comment: Just downloaded the app saw the reviews tried it anyway got the same problem dosent matter if im on wifi or 3g says no internet connection when I try to make my profile... and this is after I have already filled out all the info which makes me think they just want your essential info and thats it especially since the app hasnt been updated since 2011 and tech support wont respond to multiple emails and the website listed mentions nouthing of this app ... uninstall and report as spam
reviews.author: Gregory Kennedy

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Very happy with this app and the way it tracks my progess. Also lots of great recipes!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Are you ever going to fix this?
reviews.comment: People have complained for months about the app\'s inability to see a valid internet connection.  Ever think that the low scores might be because we can\'t adequately assess the app? Think you ought to correct this?
reviews.author: Jim Helton

reviews.title: Won\'t let me register!
reviews.comment: Soooo frustrating!  No matter what I do it keeps saying \"error, no internet connection.\"
reviews.author: Shannon Rosenberger

reviews.title: Error msg & force closin
reviews.comment: I keep getting an error:log in token error & then force closes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Error message
reviews.comment: Whenever I go to try to set up my account it keeps saying error no internet please fix it I would love to use this app
reviews.author: Kelly Arsenault

reviews.title: Log in errors
reviews.comment: Keeps saying my internet connection is down. When its not. Please fix, id like to use this app.
reviews.author: Anjo French

reviews.title: Food Diary
reviews.comment: Love it!!! But it would be great if it had someplace to record food eaten & exercise done daily
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great until...
reviews.comment: Keeps saying internet is not online with new update...boo :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please
reviews.comment: Please fix it I lost all my data can access at all
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Error
reviews.comment: Message that there is no internet connection right before i finish registering even though there is
reviews.author: Zachary Rae

reviews.title: Unhappy
reviews.comment: Loved till update... now says no internet connect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: Love the app really helpful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Works... what are these people talking about. Transforme is super fun to play with... love weight tracker graphs
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unable to access site
reviews.comment: I created profile once and was able to access site. But anytime I\'ve tried to log on since, I login and it takes me back to create a profile again
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unable to log in
reviews.comment: Ihave enter my username and password, on the next page I tap the accept terms and is boots me back to the sign in page. Never got to the actual app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs major fixing!
reviews.comment: The description sounds great but cannot get to the 3rd step of setting up profile..very disappointing..hope they fix it up expectation if it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Crashes a lot. Am going to uninstall if the update does not fix this.
reviews.author: A Google User
